entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
